history.proof: unfold sum_n. srun best use: sum_n_Sm, Nat.le_0_l, le_S.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sum_n_m_S (sum_n_m (fun n : nat => _ (S n)) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment G : AbelianGroup a : nat -> G n : nat Unable to unify "plus (sum_n_m a 0 n) (a (S n))" with "sum_n_m a 0 (S n)".

original: unfold sum_n. fold sum_n. rewrite sum_n_m_S. reflexivity.
